api.name: ObServiceNavigationComponent
api.usage: The ObServiceNavigationComponent provides an area to display widgets and is declared by the ObHeadersControlsModule.

inputs.name: environment
inputs.text: Will be used to compute the environment from which the PAMS data will be loaded. If no environment is provided, the ObServiceNavigationComponent won't make any backend call.

inputs.name: rootUrl
inputs.text: The root URL for backend calls. If provided, it takes precedence over the one computed from the environment.

inputs.name: returnUrl
inputs.text: URL to which users will be redirected after successful authentication.
